Rainy and humid weather, high morning RH (>85%) & water saturated soil favours Downy Mildew disease in cucurbit vegetables. To manage Downy Mildew disease in cucurbits spray Metalaxyl @ 2-gram/litre or Azoxystrobin @ 1-gram/litre or Copper oxychloride 50 % WP @ 3-gram/litre twice in 10 days intervals...

Rainfall followed by clear sky, dry weather, longer day with temp. 30 - 36째C favors sucking pest like aphids, Jassids, thrips and whiteflies in Okra. To manage these pests at early stage of infestation spray neem-based pesticide (Neem Oil) 1500 PPM @600-ml/acre by mixing it in 200-litre of water...
